name: 沙漠花开
description:
Desert Blossom——a yuri adventure story for girls.

Mars, a desert elf who had just come of age, went out on a trial with the encouragement of her fathers in order to inherit the position of patriarch in the future. During the journey, Mars meets the kind and brave elven nun Agres, the eccentric fox lady Lori Yuanpu and the bust merchant Lange Kenser. The yuri adventure of the girls begins.




Several people defeated the behemoth by chance, and were invited by the local count to go on a mission to find the gem, which Mars and the others gladly accepted for their respective goals. However, on the way, they found clues, and the goddess of extinction——Viod, began to awaken.
Viod is madly in love with and imprisons her sister Gaia, the goddess of life, and Viod will set off a bloody storm in the Hundred Continents, and the goal of the crowd is to add another one, to stop Viod!
